name: Mickey Goldmill
description:
The most unbelievable moments of the "Rocky" series:

#1. The Russians rooting for Rocky, Rocky IV.

#2. Rocky defeating Drago, Rocky IV.

#3. Rocky training in Siberia, Rocky IV. (Seriously, just the entire Rocky IV.)

#4. The Rocky-Dixon fight, Rocky VI. (He is 60 years old! 60!)

#5. The greenlighting of Rocky V.

#6. Rocky getting a title shot, Rocky I.

#7. Apollo and Rocky's beach hug, Rocky III.

...

#100. Finding out that Mickey is Jewish, Rocky III. (Curmudgeony old trainer? Goldmill? Jew? We saw it coming.)
